Actually I had created this project by stripping down another to reproduce a
different problem, so maybe you're going to see the next one soon...

Created an attachment (id=28950)
Simple self-contained project consisting of a few Java interfaces

Thanks for the simple test case.

The commented out stuff is causing grief:

   * @model opposite="ankaufvorschlag"
   *        annotation="JavaEcoreBuilder cached='false'"
   * @generated
   */
  //Erwerbung getErwerbung();

It's not a good idea to leave commented out things in the code.

I've changed JavaEcoreBuilder so that it removes things that were assumed to be
references but turn out to be attributes from the reference to opposite map.
